name: JUMP & SEEK
description:
A turn-based multiplayer game where you have to find the other player in a crazy jumping world.

CONTROLS:

Use keyboard 

  • Player 1:
    • WASD keys for movement
    • Q key for interaction
  • Player 2:
    • Arrow keys (8,4,56,)for movement
    • 7 key for interaction

Prototype made by:

  • Héctor Rivera
  • Miguel Moreno
  • Virgilio Fernández
